dublin_core.dcvalue: When a health system implements a picture archiving and communication system PACS film is no longer the preferred medium of image distribution from a radiology department s perspective The goal is for the department to be 100 filmless sometime after the installation However implementing change can be difficult and getting to that goal of 100 is sometimes never achieved Sutter Health has come close with 90 of studies being filmless A primary reason lies with the distribution method of providing access to images
